# Howard Korder

Howard Korder is an American screenwriter and playwright.  He is the author of the 1988 coming-of-age play ''Boys' Life, which earned him a Pulitzer Prize for Drama nomination. His play Search and Destroy was adapted into a film in 1995. Among the screenplays he has written are The Passion of Ayn Rand and Lakeview Terrace. He is also one of the writers of Boardwalk Empire''.
